text: "I'll Follow the Sun" is a song by German Eurodance group Mr. President, released as the second single from their first album, Up'n Away - The Album. Released in March 1995, this was the first single to receive participation from rapper Delroy "Layzee Dee" Rennalls, after George "Sir Prophet" Jones left the group. "I'll Follow the Sun" peaked at number 15 in Finland, number 16 in Switzerland, number 18 in Austria and number 23 in Germany. On the Eurochart Hot 100, the song reached number 58. ==Critical reception== Music & Media wrote about the song: "When the Euro president pushes the red button, you'll hear a big bang which clatters like a speeded up bassline from Jacko's Billy Jean with souped-up Giorgio Moroder computer disco." ==Music video== The music video for "I'll Follow the Sun" was directed by Czar. ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1995) !align="center"|Peak position |- |Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) |align="center"|18 |- |Europe (Eurochart Hot 100 Singles) |align="center"|58 |- |Finland (Suomen virallinen lista) |align="center"|15 |- |align="left"|Germany (Media Control Charts) |align="center"|23 |- |Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) |align="center"|16 |- |} ==References== Category:1995 singles Category:1995 songs Category:Mr. President (band) songs Category:Warner Records singles Category:Music videos directed by Czar
